## Room.createRoom() method

创建一个自定义房间并进入, 成功则可使用 this.currRoomInfo 可获取当前所在的房间信息

**Signature:**

```typescript
createRoom(playerPara: IPlayerInfoPara, roomPara: ICreateRoomPara, teamId?: string): Promise<IResult<IRoomInfo>>;
```
